title: Nyrae Dawn 10 ebooks
description:
Out of Play by Nyrae Dawn and Jolene Perry

Overview: Rock star drummer Bishop Riley doesn't have a drug problem. CelebritiesÃ¢â‚¬â€especially ones suffering from anxietyÃ¢â‚¬â€just need a little help taking the edge off sometimes. After downing a few too many pills, Bishop wakes up in the hospital facing an intervention. If he wants to stay in the band, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have to detox while under house arrest in Seldon, Alaska.Ã£â‚¬â‚¬

Hockey player Penny Jones can't imagine a life outside of Seldon. Though she has tons of scholarship offers to all the best schools, the last thing she wants is to leave. Who'll take care of her absentminded gramps? Not her mother, who canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t even be bothered to come home from work, let alone deal with their new tenants next door. 

PennyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not interested in dealing with BishopÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s crappy attitude, and BishopÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s too busy sneaking pills to care. Until he starts hanging out with Gramps and begins to see what heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been missing. If Bishop wants a chance with the fiery girl next door, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have to admit he has a problem and kick it. Too bad addiction is hard to kickÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and BishopÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s about to run out of time.
Genre: Romance

Facade by Nyrae Dawn (Games #2) 
Requirements: Epub Reader, 763kb
Overview: Can love save them?
After her father commits a crime that shatters her family, eighteen-year-old Delaney Cross is tired of pretending everything is all right. Packing up her car, she sets out to find the people her father hurt. Her search leads her to places sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s never beenÃ¢â‚¬â€and into the arms of Adrian Westfall.
To the outside world, Adrian is a sexy, charming ladiesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ man. But his playboy persona is just an act. Secretly his soul is tortured by a memory too painful to share. Only Delaney seems to see through his faÃƒÂ§ade to the real man underneath. And for the first time in his life, Adrian feels he can begin to open up about his past.
Together, Adrian and Delaney share a passionate love they never expected to find. Yet both still harbor their own secrets. When the dark truth is finally revealed, will it bring them closer togetherÃ¢â‚¬â€or tear them apart forever?


Karma Bites by Nyrae Dawn

Overview: "Whoever said, 'parents are always right' really should have thought that one through. After all, my mom believes in vampires. Go figure."

All Abigail Thompson ever wanted was to be considered normal. Instead, she ended up a loner with a vampireÃ¢â‚¬â€œobsessed mom and a stamp labeling her the resident freak of Karma, California.

When bad boy Caleb Evans saves Abby from a mean girl attack straight out of a Ã¢â‚¬Å“BÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ movie, AbbyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s own karma starts to improve. Maybe Ã¢â‚¬Å“normalÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ could become her way of life, after all. But Caleb isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t the only boy to notice her. Once newcomer Gabriel Chambers becomes AbbyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new best friend, she finds herself trapped between two boys, both holding secrets. And when Abby learns sometimes things really do go bump in the night, she discovers one of those secrets could just get her killed.
Genre: Young Adult


Four Summers by Nyrae Dawn

Overview: Charlotte Gates is tired of being Charlie Rae. She loves the lake she was raised on, their rental cabins, and spending her nights under the starsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦but inside she yearns for more.
After his freshman year, Nathaniel ChaseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s family spends their first summer at The Village.
From the beginning Charlotte intrigues him. SheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the girl who always says whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s on her mind, wins at night games, 
and each time she looks through her telescope, gets lost in the sky.
Over the course of four summers together, Charlotte and Nathaniel become best friends, share firsts, 
mend broken hearts, protect each otherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s secrets, overcome tragediesÃ¢â‚¬Â¦fall in love. And say goodbyeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
Charlie wants out of The Village. Nate wants her to have her stars. And they dream of being able to do it all together. 
But life isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t as easy as their summers.
Each summer is told in alternating points of view between Charlie and Nate. 
Journey with the pair, and their friends, as they share their story about growing up, discovering who they are,
making tough choices, and falling in love again and again.

Genre: Contemporary Romance

Dizzy by Nyrae Dawn & Jolene Perry

Overview: Dylan doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t do relationships. He and his older brother watched their dad go through hell and back, so they made a pact years agoÃ¢â‚¬â€no girl would come between the Gibson boys. But his brother sells out. He's getting married anyway. To the sister of a chick Dylan met at a party, who's probably the angriest girl he's ever met. Unfortunately, she happens to be hot, too.

ZiahÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s life is upside downÃ¢â‚¬â€her safe boyfriend turns out to be not-so-safe, and now her sister is getting married before college is over to the older brother of a spoiled, party boy who drives her crazy. And also makes her heart beat too fast.

ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no denying the attraction, but there's also no denying how much they irritate each other. When theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re thrown together as forced wedding planners, they find an ally in each other--neither wants this wedding to happen.

But instead of putting a stop to the crazy nuptials they find themselves at fittings and cake testing. And maybe evenÃ¢â‚¬Â¦a few dates?
Dizzy is a novel about what happens when two people who are determined not to fall in love, maybe do anyway. Maybe.

Genre: Romance

Charade by Nyrae Dawn

Overview: Nineteen-year-old Cheyenne tries to portray the perfect life to mask the memories of her past. Walking in on her boyfriend with another woman her freshman year in college threatens that picture of perfection. 
Twenty-one-year-old Colt never wanted college and never expected to amount to anything, but when his mom's dying wish is for him to get his degree, he has no choice but to pretend it's what he wants too. 

Cheyenne needs a fake boyfriend to get back at her ex and Colt needs cash to take care of his mom, so they strike a deal that helps them both. But what if CheyenneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s past isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t what she thought? Soon theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re trading one charade for anotherÃ¢â‚¬â€losing themselves in each other to forget about their pain. The more they play their game, the more it becomes the only thing they have that feels real.

Both Cheyenne and Colt know life is never easy, but neither of them expect the tragedy that threatens to end their charade and rip them apart forever.
Genre: Romance


Freeing Carter by Nyrae Dawn

Overview: His whole life CarterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fought to hold it together: To help Mom run their store. To be there for his special needs sister, Sara, and be the perfect boyfriend Mel wants. To dominate on the basketball courtÃ¢â‚¬â€the only place he ever feels free. And to carry Mom up the stairs when sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s too smashed to make it on her own. It isn't like she has a problem. Mom loves them. If she doesn't drink every day, she's not really an alcoholic, right? Wrong. Then Kira Dawson, a girl with a bipolar wardrobe and rotating hairstyles comes to town. Somehow, she sees the truths he hides from the world. Ã¢â‚¬Å“You have skeletons, too, Carter Shaw. DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t think I donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know it.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ For the first time, he wants someone to see his inner scarsÃ¢â‚¬â€to really know him. When his mom finally goes too far, will Carter be able to man-up, even if it means turning his back on her and stepping out from behind the faÃƒÂ§ade heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fought so hard to keep in place?
Genre: Young Adult


What A Boy Wants by Nyrae Dawn

Overview: Courtesy of watching his momÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s relationships, Sebastian Hawkins knows what girls need to do to get a guy. He has what he considers a PHD in hooking up. When he needs extra cash for a car, Sebastian starts up an online venture as The Hook-up Doctor, to anonymously help girls land the guy of their dreams. Of course, his services donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t offer a happily-ever-after guarantee. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s seen firsthand getting together never means staying together. 
And then he falls in loveÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ 
With the last girl he would expectÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
Totally not in his game plan. 
Genre: Young Adult, Realistic Fiction


Measuring Up by Nyrae Dawn

Overview: Seventeen-year-old Annabel Conway is tired of the Hillcrest High School elite making her life miserable because sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not a size two. This summer, she's hiring a personal trainer to help her lose weight. Annabel doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t expect her trainer to be a gorgeous guy around her age. Boys like Tegan are jerks. They pretend to like girls like her so they can make an idiot out of them. Been there, done that. Totally not going there again. She kind of hates him on principal. Blond. Muscular. Funny. It doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t help that he knows her measurements!
Soon, Tegan's so much more than that. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the boy who teaches her to box when she has a bad day. Who jogs with her and lets her set the pace. Who kisses her until she melts. He makes her feel beautiful regardless of what the scale says. Unlike her mom, he doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t expect perfection, and he doesn't try to shield her from the world like her dad and best friend. Tegan likes her the way she is.
But what happens when heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not there? He canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t always be thereÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
Will Annabel be able to stand on her own and learn that she already measures up? That her worth doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t lie in what the world thinks, the scale says, or even what Tegan tells herÃ¢â‚¬â€but in herself?

Genre: Contemporary Romance
